snippet.title: Phantom Fury - Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The road trip of a lifetime. Phantom Fury releases on Steam April 23rd. 

Wishlist Phantom Fury: https://3drealms.live/PhantomFury

Shelly “Bombshell” Harrison is back in this highly interactive mix of first person action and road movie adventure. Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey around the USA. Use an enormous arsenal of weapons and skills to battle treacherous soldiers and vile mutants, all while trying to save mankind.

Wishlist Phantom Fury:
https://3drealms.live/PhantomFury

Follow Phantom Fury:
https://twitter.com/Bombshell_Game
https://www.facebook.com/bombshellgame/
https://twitter.com/SlipgateIron

Follow 3D Realms:
https://twitter.com/3DRealms
https://www.facebook.com/official3dr
https://3drealms.com/
